item.title: Something new today
item.description: So apparently we’re supposed to be encoding ampersands when we write them in the href part of anchor tags. &lt;a href="http://stephaniehobson.ca/file.php Â» ?fire=hot&amp;amp;beer=foamy"&gt;link&lt;/a&gt;
